description: System table containing logging entries with information about `BACKUP` and `RESTORE` operations.
title: backup_log

description: System table containing active roles for the current user.
title: current_roles

description: System table containing information about local files that are in the queue to be sent to the shards.
title: distribution_queue

description: System table containing information about dictionaries
title: dictionaries

description: System table containing metadata of each table that the server knows about.
title: tables

description: System table containing information about resources residing on the local server with one row for every resource.
title: resources

description: System table containing profiling information on the processors level (which can be found in `EXPLAIN PIPELINE`)
title: processors_profile_log

description: System table containing all active roles at the moment, including the current role of the current user and the granted roles for the current role
title: enabled_roles

description: System table containing information about the dependent views executed when running a query, for example, the view type or the execution time.
title: query_views_log

description: System table containing logging entries with information about various blob storage operations such as uploads and deletes.
title: blob_storage_log

description: System table containing information about storage policies and volumes which are defined in server configuration.
title: storage_policies

description: System table containing information about existing data skipping indices in all the tables.
title: data_skipping_indices

description: System table containing information about session settings for current user.
title: settings

description: System table containing descriptions of table engines supported by the server and the features they support.
title: table_engines

description: System table used for implementing the `SHOW PROCESSLIST` query.
title: processes

description: System table containing information about columns in all tables
title: columns

description: System table containing formation about quota usage by the current user such as how much of the quota is used and how much is left.
title: quota_usage

description: System table containing information about disks defined in the server configuration
title: disks

description: System table containing information about parameters `graphite_rollup` which are used in tables with `GraphiteMergeTree` type engines.
title: graphite_retentions

description: System table containing formation about quota usage by all users.
title: quotas_usage

description: System table containing the role grants for users and roles.
title: role_grants

description: System table containing information about async inserts. Each entry represents an insert query buffered into an async insert query.
title: asynchronous_insert_log

description: System table containing information about trace spans for executed queries.
title: opentelemetry_span_log

description: System table containing information about the settings of S3Queue tables. Available from server version `24.10`.
title: s3_queue_settings

description: System table useful for C++ experts and ClickHouse engineers containing information for introspection of the `clickhouse` binary.
title: symbols

description: System table containing information about distributed ddl queries (queries using the ON CLUSTER clause) that were executed on a cluster.
title: distributed_ddl_queue

description: System database providing an almost standardized DBMS-agnostic view on metadata of database objects.
title: INFORMATION_SCHEMA

description: System table containing information about and status of recent asynchronous jobs (e.g. for tables which are loading). The table contains a row for every job.
title: asynchronous_loader

description: System table containing a list of database engines supported by the server.
title: database_engines

description: System table containing information about quotas.
title: quotas

description: System table containing information about detached parts of MergeTree tables
title: detached_parts

description: System table containing information about the parameters of the request to the ZooKeeper server and the response from it.
title: zookeeper_log

description: System table containing information about memory allocations done via jemalloc allocator in different size classes (bins) aggregated from all arenas.
title: jemalloc_bins

description: System table containing information about cached DNS records.
title: dns_cache

description: System table containing information about threads that execute queries, for example, thread name, thread start time, duration of query processing.
title: query_thread_log

description: System table containing history of all latency buckets, periodically flushed to disk.
title: latency_log

description: System table containing information about merges and part mutations currently in process for tables in the MergeTree family.
title: merges

description: System table containing a history of memory and metric values from table `system.events` for individual queries, periodically flushed to disk.
title: query_metric_log

description: System table containing information about settings of AzureQueue tables. Available from server version `24.10`.
title: azure_queue_settings

description: System table containing information about all successful and failed login and logout events.
title: session_log

description: System table containing information about and status of scheduling nodes residing on the local server.
title: scheduler

description: System table containing error codes with the number of times they have been triggered.
title: errors

description: System table containing licenses of third-party libraries that are located in the contrib directory of ClickHouse sources.
title: licenses

description: System table containing information useful for an overview of memory usage and ProfileEvents of users.
title: user_processes

description: System table containing information about currently running background fetches.
title: replicated_fetches

description: System table containing information about supported data types
title: data_type_families

description: System table containing information about existing projections in all tables.
title: processors_profile_log

description: System table containing stack traces collected by the sampling query profiler.
title: trace_log

description: System table containing information about configured roles.
title: roles

description: System table containing a list of user accounts configured on the server.
title: users

description: System table containing information about events that occurred with data parts in the MergeTree family tables, such as adding or merging of data.
title: part_log

description: System table containing information about and status of replicated tables residing on the local server. Useful for monitoring.
title: replicas

description: System table containing information about Refreshable Materialized Views.
title: view_refreshes

description: System table containing information about tables that drop table has been executed on but for which data cleanup has not yet been performed
title: dropped_tables

description: System table containing information about contributors.
title: contributors

description: System table containing information about parts of MergeTree dropped tables from `system.dropped_tables`
title: dropped_tables_parts

description: System table containing information about executed queries, for example, start time, duration of processing, error messages.
title: query_log

description: System table containing logging entries.
title: text_log

description: System table containing information about normal and aggregate functions.
title: functions

description: System table containing historical values for `system.asynchronous_metrics`, which are saved once per time interval (one second by default)
title: asynchronous_metric_log

description: System table containing information about in-progress data part moves of MergeTree tables. Each data part movement is represented by a single row.
title: moves

description: System table containing information about bucket bounds used by `latency_log`.
title: latency_buckets

description: System table containing information about the databases that are available to the current user.
title: databases

description: System table containing information about maximums for all intervals of all quotas. Any number of rows or zero can correspond to one quota.
title: quota_limits

description: System table containing metrics which can be calculated instantly, or have a current value.
title: metrics

description: System table which shows the content of the query cache.
title: query_cache

description: System table containing a single row with a single `dummy` UInt8 column containing the value 0. Similar to the `DUAL` table found in other DBMSs.
title: one

description: System table containing information about pending asynchronous inserts in queue.
title: asynchronous_inserts

description: System table containing a list of time zones that are supported by the ClickHouse server.
title: time_zones

description: System table containing information about all cached file schemas.
title: schema_inference_cache

description: System table similar to `system.numbers` but reads are parallelized and numbers can be returned in any order.
title: numbers_mt

description: System table containing history of metrics values from tables `system.metrics` and `system.events`, periodically flushed to disk.
title: metric_log

description: System table which describes the content of the settings profile: constraints, roles and users that the setting applies to, parent settings profiles.
title: settings_profile_elements

description: System table containing formation about global settings for the server, which are specified in `config.xml`.
title: server_settings

description: System table containing information about each detached table.
title: detached_tables

description: System table containing filters for one particular table, as well as a list of roles and/or users which should use this row policy.
title: row_policies

description: System table showing which privileges are granted to ClickHouse user accounts.
title: grants

description: System table containing the history of error values from table `system.errors`, periodically flushed to disk.
title: error_log

description: System table containing information about settings for MergeTree tables.
title: merge_tree_settings

description: System table containing a single UInt64 column named `number` that contains almost all the natural numbers starting from zero.
title: numbers

description: System table containing information about stack traces for fatal errors.
title: crash_log

description: System table containing information for workloads residing on the local server.
title: workloads

description: System table which contains stack traces of all server threads. Allows developers to introspect the server state.
title: stack_trace

description: System table containing information about clusters available in the config file and the servers defined in them.
title: clusters

description: System table containing information about the number of events that have occurred in the system.
title: events

description: System table containing information about mutations of MergeTree tables and their progress. Each mutation command is represented by a single row.
title: mutations

description: System table containing information about setting changes in previous ClickHouse versions.
title: settings_changes

description: System table containing information about parts and columns of MergeTree tables.
title: parts_columns

description: System table which exists only if ZooKeeper is configured. Shows current connections to ZooKeeper (including auxiliary ZooKeepers).
title: zookeeper_connection

description: Contains queries used by `/dashboard` page accessible though the HTTP interface. useful for monitoring and troubleshooting.
title: dashboards

description: System table containing information about ClickHouse server's build options.
title: build_options

description: System table containing metrics that are calculated periodically in the background. For example, the amount of RAM in use.
title: asynchronous_metrics

description: System table containing information about Kafka consumers.
title: kafka_consumers

description: System table which contains properties of configured setting profiles.
title: settings_profiles

description: System table which exists only if ClickHouse Keeper or ZooKeeper are configured. It exposes data from the Keeper cluster defined in the config.
title: zookeeper

description: System table containing information about tasks from replication queues stored in ClickHouse Keeper, or ZooKeeper, for tables in the `ReplicatedMergeTree` family.
title: replication_queue
